page.title: 14RELIGION
page.content:
{Bishops Nympton Church} {By Clare and Shelley.
The church was built on the present site towards the end of the 12th century.It was consecrated Whitsun.The oldest part of the church is the front, which is Norman. The church itself was rebuilt in the 15th century and this church was restored in 1603. In the church now there are many clubs such as{Quest Club,Notes,Prayer {Group,Bible Group,Choir Practice,Work {shop,Summer Club and Criss Cross Quiz. There was a vicar who died of black death and he was called William Balraven De Sevtham.Before the church was of stone it was built wood.There are 413 gravestones in the graveyard.
